job.title: Android Software Engineer
job.description:
** Multiple Roles - Immediate Interview & Start **   W2 (Preferred).    TRAVEL INDUSTRY CLIENT (FORTUNE COMPANY)   Role:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Android Software EngineerLocation:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Irvine, CA (Remote till Covid)Duration:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Long Term Contract   Job Description:  - Should have 4 - 6 years of experience   
  - Should have good experience with Android   
  - Good experience on Java, RxJava   
  - Expertise required in Kotlin, RabbitMQ, MQTT   
  - Must have worked in Junit, Git, Gradle   
  - Ideal candidate would be responsible for leading development of Android-based passenger application for DFP’s In-Flight Entertainment system.   
  - Must be a Team player   
  - should have excellent written and verbal communication skill.   
   If you are interested to pursue this opportunity, please send your updated resume to Sam@agiledatapro.com
